name: Ghost Block (BoxOfDoge)
description:
Ghost Block

A puzzle about escaping a weird underground dungeon, but, there's ghosts blocking your way! Sometimes ghosts will follow each move you make, so use the space and walls around you to adjust their position.

The Goal

The goal of the game is to get to the door and complete the level! Some door s are locked behind a button, so you will have to use something push the button while you rush to get through the door.

Concept

The concept of this game was inspired by the Japanese game called "Sokoban", which I recommend checking out. 

Feedback

If you have already played, please write a comment below with your feedback  or criticism of this game since this is only my second game ever published.

This game was made by @BoxOfDoge in 1 week for the Brackey's 2022.2 Game Jam.
